channel.title: R Markdown on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in R Markdown on A Hugo website

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: install.packages("devtools") ## Installing package into '/home/rstudio-user/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/4.0' ## (as 'lib' is unspecified) devtools::install_github("hodgettsp/cesR") ## Skipping install of 'cesR' from a github remote, the SHA1 (7c780beb) has not changed since last install.
